chapter.title: Event Driven Task Multiplexing Library
chapter.para: The code contained in the mpx repository contains a library mpx-lib which allows the parallel execution of any number of software tasks in one or more working threads. In addition, the sftp library and the sftp-test program are also located in this repository, to test this library.
